H0.text: Which common flower has the Latin name Bellis Perennis . Buttercup

H1.text: Which common flower has the Latin name Bellis Perennis . Violet

H2.text: Which common flower has the Latin name Bellis Perennis . Primrose

H3.text: Which common flower has the Latin name Bellis Perennis . DAISY

A4.text: Bellis perennis ( BEL-iss p…ô-REN-iss), the daisy, is a European species of the family Asteraceae, often considered the archetypal species of the name daisy.

A5.text: To distinguish this species from other plants known as daisies, it is sometimes qualified or known as common daisy, lawn daisy or English daisy.
